languages.text: "Полагаю, она там же, где и остальные господа из рода Версериан... То бишь, под конвоем дворцовой стражи в тронном зале. Сегодня губернатор Драйвстем собрал весь свет Даргонуса там, чтобы огласить обвинительный приговор дому Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "Полагаю, она там же, где и остальные господа из рода Версериан... То бишь, под конвоем дворцовой стражи в тронном зале. Сегодня губернатор Драйвстем собрал весь свет Даргонуса там, чтобы огласить обвинительный приговор дому Версериан".

languages.text: "I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, она там же, где и остальные господа из рода Версериан... То бишь, под конвоем дворцовой стражи в тронном зале. Сегодня губернатор Драйвстем собрал весь свет Даргонуса там, чтобы огласить обвинительный приговор дому Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."
"I think she is at the same place where the rest of House Werserian are... Detained in the throne room, that is."

"I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."
"I think she is at the same place where the rest of House Werserian are... Detained in the throne room, that is."

"I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."
"I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is."

"I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."

languages.text: 「彼女は他のウェルザリアン家の皆様と一緒に…王座の間に拘留されているかと。ドライブステム総督は、ウェルザリアン家に対する有罪判決を宣告するために、ダルゴナスの貴族全員をそこに集めたのです」
languages.original_text: "I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は他のウェルザリアン家の皆様と一緒に…王座の間に拘留されているかと。ドライブステム総督は、ウェルザリアン家に対する有罪判決を宣告するために、ダルゴナスの貴族全員をそこに集めたのです」

languages.text: “我想，她与韦尔森家族的其他人一样……此刻正被关押在王座大厅里。德莱夫斯塔总督召集了达戈努斯的所有贵族，打算在王座大厅里对韦尔森家族下达有罪判决。”
languages.original_text: "I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: “我想，她与韦尔森家族的其他人一样……此刻正被关押在王座大厅里。”

languages.text: « Avec le reste de la maison Werserian, je pense... Autrement dit, elle doit être retenue dans la salle du trône. Le gouverneur Drivestem y a rassemblé toute la noblesse de Dargonus pour prononcer un verdict de culpabilité à l'encontre de la famille. »
languages.original_text: "I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: « Avec le reste de la maison Werserian, je pense... Autrement dit, elle doit être retenue dans la salle du trône. Le gouverneur Drivestem y a rassemblé toute la noblesse de Dargonus pour prononcer un verdict de culpabilité à l'encontre de la famille. »

languages.text: «Creo que está en el mismo sitio que el resto de la casa Werserian... Arrestada en la sala del trono. El gobernador Drivestem ha convocado a toda la nobleza de Dargonus para declarar culpable a la casa Werserian».
languages.original_text: "I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que está en el mismo sitio que el resto de la casa Werserian... Arrestada en la sala del trono».

languages.text: "Ich denke, sie ist beim Rest von Haus Werserian ... Also unter Arrest im Thronsaal. Gouverneur Drivestem hat den gesamten Adel von Dargonus dort versammelt, um einen Schuldspruch gegen Haus Werserian zu verhängen."
languages.original_text: "I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Sie ist vermutlich dort, wo auch der Rest von Haus Werserian ist ... Nämlich unter Arrest im Thronsaal."

languages.text: "Galiba Werserian Hanesi mensuplarıyla birlikte... Taht odasında tutuklu vaziyetteler. Vali Drivestem, Dargonus'taki tüm soyluları oraya topladı. Werserian Hanesi'nin suçlu bulunduğunu duyuracaktı."
languages.original_text: "I think she is with the rest of House Werserian... Detained in the throne room, that is. Governor Drivestem has gathered all of Dargonus's nobility there to pronounce a guilty verdict against House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Galiba Werserian Hanesi mensuplarıyla birlikte... Taht odasında tutuklu vaziyetteler. Vali Drivestem Dargonus'taki tüm soyluları oraya topladı. Werserian Hanesi'nin suçlu bulunduğunu duyuracak."
